mapper.select: SELECT w.warehouse_code AS warehouseCode, w.warehouse_name AS warehouseName, w.location AS warehouseLocation, w.capacity_limit AS capacityLimit, m.member_code AS mamberCode, m.name AS name, m.email AS email FROM tbl_warehouse w LEFT JOIN tbl_member m ON w.manager_code = m.member_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_warehouse (warehouse_name, location, capacity_limit, manager_code) VALUES (#{warehouseName}, #{warehouseLocation}, #{capacityLimit}, #{mamberCode})
